title: President-Elect Buhari Tells Nigerians Not To Expect 'Miracles'
teaser: Nigerians have elected a former military strongman to be their next president. Muhammadu Buhari, who insists he's a changed man, says his first order of business will be to crush Boko Haram militants.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
